TopicTitle: [1.0.5] Stryker's Aerospace and Armory (Continued by SM)

Articles.Content:
It's gonna be a while until i have the free time to learn how to make an engine m8 , when i finish the spitfire im going to stop for a while then when i get to christmas vacations i will work on the engines

I'll just be patient then... good luck on making those engines! (If you get around to doing them) You're doing a really great job so far!

http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/90/Boulton_Paul_Defiant.png/800px-Boulton_Paul_Defiant.png

The Boulton Paul Defiant! The cockpit would be fine but if you could learn BDArmoury it would be awesome to have the turret!

Once you're ready of course. You should start taking more requests I think because you have an amazing project going!

http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/90/Boulton_Paul_Defiant.png/800px-Boulton_Paul_Defiant.png

The Boulton Paul Defiant! The cockpit would be fine but if you could learn BDArmoury it would be awesome to have the turret!

Once you're ready of course. You should start taking more requests I think because you have an amazing project going!

Many requests....little time... :s

Many requests....little time... :s

Take your time, these are amazing cockpits and they keep getting better. It would be a shame to see the quality decline for the sake of quick releases.

http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/90/Boulton_Paul_Defiant.png/800px-Boulton_Paul_Defiant.png

The Boulton Paul Defiant! The cockpit would be fine but if you could learn BDArmoury it would be awesome to have the turret!

Once you're ready of course. You should start taking more requests I think because you have an amazing project going!

IVAs can't swivel. But that would be good. But can we have a picture of the LaGG-3 to see how it looked? Or did you trash the entire model? And the MiG-21 is all weird.

can we have a picture of the LaGG-3 to see how it looked?

Speaking of which, I might give it a shot in sketchup sometime. Would you or stryker like to see that if it happens?

To those who like Warthunder, i made a small video just for fun

To those who like Warthunder, i made a small video just for fun

Don't you love the new update!?! I can't wait to get the IL-28!
Hold on a sec, why do you like the LaGG-3 so much? You do realise that is was a massive failure, right? I would look to the much better La-5 or La-7.

Hold on a sec, why do you like the LaGG-3 so much? You do realise that is was a massive failure, right? I would look to the much better La-5 or La-7.

It was not, in fact, a massive failure. It could up its own with an early Bf-109, which it was designed to fight, and it was widely used. So it was more of a partial success than a massive failure. But I do like the La-5(Not F or FN models) But it's major weakness was it didn't have low caliber guns, meaning low ammo.
I see what you mean but only an EARLY 109, but a true big failure was the MiG-3 lol!

I see what you mean but only an EARLY 109, but a true big failure was the MiG-3 lol!

Kinda. The Yak-1/3/7/9 series was the great success of the USSR though.

Hold on a sec, why do you like the LaGG-3 so much? You do realise that is was a massive failure, right? I would look to the much better La-5 or La-7.
